name: Improved Swarm Form
text: You can assume the form of various varmints.
benefit: Choose one of the following forms: bat swarm, centipede swarm, cockroach swarm<sup>B2</sup>, leech swarm, rat swarm, or spider swarm. As a standard action, you can change into this form.
special: You can gain this feat multiple times. Each time you take this feat, choose another swarm type.
